div.p: If you had 1 million euros, what would you do with it?

I don't know what i would do with a million, but I know what i won't do with a million ! For instance, i'm sure that i won't stop working, because one million is not enough to live a comfortable life (pay your house, a car, raise childrens etc...). I think I'd rather invest this million in something like real estate. The only "useless" thing I'll afford with this money is probably great holidays with my friends, somewhere really far from here. But for the rest of this money, I think I'll just invest it, there's nothing more to do with this amount of money. Or maybe a fast italian sportcar, I don't know. To sum up, I think I will buy/do one thing useless with this money, and the rest is going to be in financial.
